function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of physical system data in virtual system","Impact":"Mismatch between physical and virtual system behavior","Mitigation":"Regular calibration and validation of virtual system with physical system data","Technologies":"Data integration and validation software","People":"Planners, system engineers, data analysts","Owner":"System engineers, data analysts"},{"Description":"Transmission of contagious diseases through physical system data handling","Impact":"Spread of diseases among stakeholders and users of the system","Mitigation":"Implementation of strict hygiene protocols for data handling, usage of personal protective equipment","Technologies":"Data sanitization tools, contactless data handling technology","People":"System engineers, data analysts, maintenance staff","Owner":"System engineers, maintenance staff"},{"Description":"Inadequate sanitation of physical system data","Impact":"Risk of contamination and disease transmission","Mitigation":"Regular cleaning and sanitization of data collection and handling equipment","Technologies":"Data sanitization tools, disinfecting agents","People":"System engineers, data analysts, maintenance staff","Owner":"Maintenance staff, system engineers"}]}
